usage.cn: 你永远不能战胜一个纯SB，因为他会把你的智商拉到跟他一个水平，然后用丰富的经验打败你……
usage.eng: Do not argue with an idiot. He will drag you down to his level and beat you with experience.

usage.cn: 等我长大了，我要先生一个哥哥，然后再生一个妹妹；以后，哪个臭小子谁敢让我女儿哭，我儿子一定揍扁他。
usage.eng: When I grow up, I want a son first, then a daughter; so my son would beat up any boy that makes my little girl cry.

usage.cn: 每一天都为你心跳，每一刻都被你感动，每一秒都为你担心。有你的感觉真好。
usage.eng: My heart beats for you every day. I am inspired by you every minute, and I worry about you every second. It is wonderful to have you in my life.

usage.cn: 我的世界太过安静，静得可以听见自己心跳的声音。你的言语，我爱听，却不懂得；我的沉默，你喜欢，却不明白。
usage.eng: My world is so silent that I can hear the sound of my own heart beats. I like your words but I can't understand them. You like my silence but you don't understand them.
